description: Why pay for a URL shortener? This app easily shortens long web addresses quickly and for free. Simply enter the long address (URL) into the appropriate text field and click shorten. Your URL is then shortened using the is.gd service, and the short URL is pasted to clipboard for copy and pasting. You can also optionally enter a keyword to attach to the end of the short URL to identify it. This app is the quickest and easiest way to shorten a URL.
